note.text: Track down the lost treasure of Dead Eye Gulch and save the Krusty Krab.
Find a way to gain access to the secret cave at the top of Goo Lagoon beach.
Plankton has trapped you in the cave, find another way to get out.
There's another hidden cave at the bottom of Goo Lagoon beach. Find a way in.
The treasure is somewhere in Dead Eye mine. The entrance is through the Jellyfish fields.
Patrick is hungry, try and find him something to eat.
Squidward's Reef Blower might be useful. Find a way to distract him.
Mrs. Puff has lost her boat keys. Keep an eye out for them.
Harold is selling lemonade for 25 cents. Try to find a quarter (or something similar).
Larry wants to impress girls with a feat of strength, but he's too thirsty.
Mailfish's bag is stuck on the Krusty Krab sign. Find a way to knock it down.
Mailfish needs his mailbag to deliver the rest of the mail.
Dr. Gill is giving free health checks at the hospital for everyone who was mailed a coupon.
Officer John is guarding the mine entrance. You need to find something to distract/bribe him.
